Detailed Description

template<typename T, const unsigned int D>
class kche_tree::DataSet< T, D >

Template for data sets containing feature vectors.

Encapsulates a list of D-dimensional feature vectors with the provided size. Depending on the constructor used, will allocate the vectors or will use an existing array of them without taking any ownership.

Template Parameters:
TData type of the elements in each vector.
DNumber of dimensions of each vector.
